languages.text:
"Сколь милосердно поступаешь ты,
Не забывая тех, кто слаб и наг.
Заботу проявлю о них и я,
Уберегу от ужасов Комморры".

"The picture of compassion, so you are,
Remembering the weak and bare this way,
Why not? I'll show my care for them as well,
And guard them from Commorragh's horrors all."
languages.original_text:
"Сколь милосердно поступаешь ты,
Не забывая тех, кто слаб и наг.
Заботу проявлю о них и я,
Уберегу от ужасов Комморры".

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
“这一幕如此温暖，令人感慨。
你想指引那些弱者逃离苦海。
有何不可？我愿意表达我的关怀，
保护他们免受科摩罗的恐怖所害。”
languages.original_text:
"The picture of compassion, so you are,
Remembering the weak and bare this way,
Why not? I'll show my care for them as well,
And guard them from Commorragh's horrors all."

traits.locale_text:
“这一幕如此温暖，令人感慨。
你想指引那些弱者逃离苦海。
有何不可？我愿意表达我的关怀，
保护他们免受科摩罗的恐怖所害。”
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
«El retrato de la compasión, sin duda,
al recordar así a los débiles e indefensos.
¿Por qué no? Demostraré que me preocupan
y les ahorraré de Commorragh los horrores inmensos».
languages.original_text:
"The picture of compassion, so you are,
Remembering the weak and bare this way,
Why not? I'll show my care for them as well,
And guard them from Commorragh's horrors all."

traits.locale_text:

al recordar así a los débiles e indefensos.
¿Por qué no? Demostraré que me preocupan
y les ahorraré de Commorragh los horrores inmensos».
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
「か弱き者たちを忘れない
慈愛を絵に描いたような君
いいだろう。それなら僕も愛を示そう
コモラフの恐怖から彼らを守ろう」
languages.original_text:
"The picture of compassion, so you are,
Remembering the weak and bare this way,
Why not? I'll show my care for them as well,
And guard them from Commorragh's horrors all."

traits.locale_text:
「か弱き者たちを忘れない
慈愛を絵に描いたような君
いいだろう。それなら僕も愛を示そう
コモラフの恐怖から彼らを守ろう」
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"Welch Mitgefühl Ihr zeigt, bemerkenswert.
Die Schwachen und Nackten, Ihr denkt an sie.
Nun gut. Ich kümm're auch um sie mich gern,
vor Commorraghs Grauen beschütze sie."
languages.original_text:
"The picture of compassion, so you are,
Remembering the weak and bare this way,
Why not? I'll show my care for them as well,
And guard them from Commorragh's horrors all."

traits.locale_text:
"Welch Mitgefühl Ihr zeigt, bemerkenswert.
Die Schwachen und Nackten, Ihr denkt an sie.
Nun gut. Ich kümm're auch um sie mich gern,
vor Commorraghs Grauen beschütze sie."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
« Vous êtes le visage incarné de la compassion,
Vous n'oubliez pas les démunis et les plus délicats.
Pourquoi pas ? Je ferai moi aussi attention
Et les protégerai des horreurs de Commorragh. »
languages.original_text:
"The picture of compassion, so you are,
Remembering the weak and bare this way,
Why not? I'll show my care for them as well,
And guard them from Commorragh's horrors all."

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"Şefkat senden sorulur,
Konu gelince ıssıza ve güçsüze.
Hem lafı mı olur? Bakar tek bir sözüne,
Arleken onları Commorragh'tan korur."
languages.original_text:
"The picture of compassion, so you are,
Remembering the weak and bare this way,
Why not? I'll show my care for them as well,
And guard them from Commorragh's horrors all."
